did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Bruce Bliven's Five million words later ,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: Gift of Bruce Bliven, John Day Co. Publishers, 1972

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Bruce Bliven's Five million words later , M0236, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Editor of the New Republic, writer, and lecturer. Bliven, born 27 July 1889, received his b.a. in English from Stanford University in 1911. He died 6 May 1977.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Typescript and three galleys of Bliven's autobiography.

did.unittitle: Typescript - 1 pp. 1-217 with author's ms. corrections plus additonal correction etc. at beginning.
Galley- Master Set, Pass 1 with ms. corrections and notations mostly by editors.
Galley- Author's Set, Pass 1 with ms. corrections and notations in author's hand.
Galley- Master Set, Pass 2 with ms.corrections and notations by author and editors.
